skilllist.skilldesc:
Hylos gains 1.5 extra Max HP for every 1 extra Max Mana he possesses.

When out of Mana, Hylos can use his HP for skill casts.

Hylos gains 50% Movement Speed and causes his next Basic Attack within 3s to deal 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target, knocking back and stunning them for 1s.

<font color="A4AAC7">The extra Movement Speed rapidly decays over the duration and vanishes after the next Basic Attack.</font>

Hylos releases the <font color="a6aafb">Ring of Punishment</font>, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies per second while slowing them by 4% and reducing their Attack Speed by 7.5% for 2.5s (up to 8 stacks). Each stack also increases the enemy's damage taken from the <font color="a6aafb">Ring of Punishment</font> by 5%. The <font color="a6aafb">Ring of Punishment</font> consumes 30 Mana per second when it's active.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Hylos cancels the <font color="a6aafb">Ring of Punishment</font>.

Hylos creates a huge pathway in the target direction, reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 75% for 1s. The pathway lasts 6s.
When on the pathway, Hylos gains Slow Immunity and recovers 3% of his Max HP per second. Allied heroes moving along the pathway gain 60% extra Movement Speed, while enemy heroes on the pathway will be slowed by 25%.

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldescemblem: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Pure Tank that can charge into any situation with Ultimate.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After the next Basic Attack, deal <Num1> Magic Damage to nearby enemies.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill2: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Encourage: 
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.

equiplist.equipskill1: Destiny: Gains 4.5(+0.5*Hero Level) Hybrid Defense for 5s when dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes, stacking up to 6 times (can gain 1 stack every 0.4s).
equiplist.equipskill2: Gift: When HP drops below 50%, recovers 15% of HP over the next 3s. When Mana drops below 50%, restores 15% of Mana over the next 3s. Cooldown: 60s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Destiny: Gains 4.5(+0.5*Hero Level) Hybrid Defense for 5s when dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes, stacking up to 6 times (can gain 1 stack every 0.4s).
Gift: When HP drops below 50%, recovers 15% of HP over the next 3s. When Mana drops below 50%, restores 15% of Mana over the next 3s. Cooldown: 60s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+400 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+950 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Magic Defense
+12 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - SAWO
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc:
Hylos works best with heroes that need faster Movement Speed to engage,
such as Terizla and Minsitthar.

strong.desc: Hylos is strong against heroes without mobility skills that can't easily escape his 2nd Skill, like Layla and Gord.

weak.desc: Hylos is countered by high mobility heroes like Karrie and Lesley, as they are hard for him to lock down and can also take him out.
